changelog.changes: Hardening release: TR39 confusable-homoglyphs library integration (7000+ Unicode confusable pairs), MCP tool definition scanning (CVE-2025-53773), memory session isolation + provenance tracking (source_trust column), red team test suite (72 adversarial tests). No new signatures.
Added PI-021..025, MP-016..020, TE-011..015, US-021/022, AA-016, EX-016/017, WA-016..020. Code: crescendo tracking, symlink resolution, nested encoding detection, DNS rebinding protection.

notes: All patterns tested for valid regex syntax
False positive rates estimated based on pattern specificity
Regular updates recommended as new attack vectors emerge
v1.1: Based on threat intelligence research covering OWASP 2025, Microsoft crescendo paper, CVE-2025-53109/53110/53773, ZombieAgent/MemoryGraft research
